content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the municipal court đakovo the case involved a dispute over coownership of real estate properties the procedure lasted for 11 months and resulted in the dissolution of a cadastral municipality and the division of the properties the petitioner j š opposed the coowners a p and m b a geometric division was determined creating new cadastral plots for each party the properties were transferred to the sole ownership of each party according to the division an authorized civil engineer geodesist prepared the necessary documentation for the division the court accepted the proposal for dissolution and division based on the property act
